nodes.text: Demelza's Destructors was a gladiator walker combat team during the Galactic Civil War led by Demelza Mintori. The unit and its leader held a grudge against Madrix Hansor and his team, Hansor's Hooligans that seemed unending. The grudge began when Mintori and Hansor were part of an Imperial Army unit fighting Alliance forces in the Dalcretti system. When Mintori's platoon was either unable to or refused to led assistance to Hansor's platoon, Hansor vowed vengeance.

The Destructors were based out of Sedratis City, and were the city's premier gladiator walker team. Hansor led his Hooligans to Sedratis City and took up residence in the Sedratis Coliseum and challenged the Destructors to evict him if they could.
